divs: sighting detailson 8\30\2013 at 5:10 am my small house dog started barking to be let out of her kennel. i got up to let her out. i went out through the garage where our other dog sleeps. when the dogs went outside one of the dogs just stopped an stared in a ne direction as if she seen something. i looked in the direction she was looking and noticed a row of lights in the sky. i first thought my vision was blurred due to just waking up, but then i noticed the lights were randomly flashing. the formation of the lights looked like this ----v----. i went to get my binoculars to see if i could get a better look and when i came back the lights were in 4 orbs in a diamond formation. i didn't feel threaten because it was several miles away. i tried to take a picture with my camera phone but it was just a blur due to the distance. it faded away and was gone.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Mooresville

Summary: Dog barking to go outside. Let out and dog stared in direction. Looked up and saw a row of light in sky very close together.
